name: 2D Platformer Prototype (ShovelingBear)
description:
University assignment to make 3 game prototypes to be improved upon. 2/3

2D Platformer is a side scroller jumping puzzle prototype

Currently, it is run around the map to collect hearts and jump on bats.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Move Left, Right and Jump
  • 'WASD' - Move and Jump
  • Space - Jump
  • Alt + F4 or CMD + Q - Quit
